monogr.title: The Pentateuch Exegesis of the Karaites Yusuf ibn Nuh and Abu al-Faraj Harun: An Examination of Method in the Context of the Contemporaneous Literary and Exegetical Approaches of Jews, Christians and Muslims

body.bibl: Goldstein, Miriam. The Pentateuch Exegesis of the Karaites Yusuf Ibn Nuh and Abu Al-Faraj Harun: An Examination of Method in the Context of the Contemporaneous Literary and Exegetical Approaches of Jews, Christians and Muslims. Jerusalem: Hebrew University, 2006.
